verses.verse: Now the YY <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Abram <S%H87><s%>, Get thee out <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> of thy country <S%H776><s%>, and from thy kindred <S%H4138><s%>, and from thy father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, unto a land <S%H776><s%> that I will shew <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee:

And I will make of thee <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>, and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee, and make <S%H1431><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> great <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8762><s%>; and thou shalt be a b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%>:

And I will bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them that bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee, and curse <S%H779><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him that curseht <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee: and in thee shall all families <S%H4940><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> be blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

So Abram <S%H87><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto him; and Lot <S%H3876><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with him: and Abram <S%H87><s%> was seventy <S%H7657><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he departed <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> out of Haran <S%H2771><s%>.

And Abram <S%H87><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Sarai <S%H8297><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>, and Lot <S%H3876><s%> his brother's <S%H251><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, and all their substance <S%H7399><s%> that they had gathered <S%H7408><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the souls <S%H5315><s%> that they had gotten <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in Haran <S%H2771><s%>; and they went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>; and into the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Abram <S%H87><s%> passed through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> of Sichem <S%H7927><s%>, unto the plain <S%H436><s%> of Moreh <S%H4176><s%>. And the Kanahanite <S%H3669><s%> was then <S%H227><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto Abram <S%H87><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Unto thy seed <S%H2233><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%>: and there builded <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> he an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, who appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8737><s%> unto him.

And he removed <S%H6275><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from thence unto a mountain <S%H2022><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> of Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>, and pitched <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%>, having Beit-El <S%H1008><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%>, and Hai <S%H5857><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%>: and there he builded <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
And Abram <S%H87><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, going on <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%> still <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8800><s%> toward the south <S%H5045><s%>.

And there was a famine <S%H7458><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>: and Abram <S%H87><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8800><s%> there; for the famine <S%H7458><s%> was grievous <S%H3515><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H834><s%> he was come near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, that he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Sarai <S%H8297><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%>, Behold <S%H2009><s%> now <S%H4994><s%>, I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that thou art a fair <S%H3303><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> to look upon <S%H4758><s%>:

Therefore it shall come to pass, when the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, that they shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, This is his wife <S%H802><s%>: and they will kill <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me, but they will save thee alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray thee <S%H4994><s%>, thou art my sister <S%H269><s%>: that <S%H4616><s%> it may be well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with me for thy sake; and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8804><s%> because of thee <S%H1558><s%>.

And it came to pass, that, when Abram <S%H87><s%> was come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> beheld <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> that she was very <S%H3966><s%> fair <S%H3303><s%>.

The princes <S%H8269><s%> also of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her, and commended <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8762><s%> her before <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>: and the woman <S%H802><s%> was taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8714><s%> into Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.

And he entreated <S%H3190><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8689><s%> for her sake: and he had sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and he asses <S%H2543><s%>, and menservants <S%H5650><s%>, and maidservants <S%H8198><s%>, and she asses <S%H860><s%>, and camels <S%H1581><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> plagued <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8762><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and his house <S%H1004><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> plagues <S%H5061><s%> because of <S%H1697><s%> Sarai <S%H8297><s%> Abram's <S%H87><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What is this that thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me? why didst thou not tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me that she was thy wife <S%H802><s%> ?

Why saidst thou <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, She is my sister <S%H269><s%>? so I might have taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her to me to wife <S%H802><s%>: now therefore behold thy wife <S%H802><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> her, and go thy way <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his men <S%H582><s%> concerning him: and they sent him away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and his wife <S%H802><s%>, and all that he had.
